The process involves turning the steering wheel in one direction, shifting into reverse, pressing the clutch, and then flooring the accelerator. Here's how the document might look like in English: 'This method works only with cars that have a manual transmission as you will need to use the clutch. Complete the donut and shift your car back into park by pressing the clutch and brake.'.
